attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The M1 speed limit shout be increased in 2010 after the widening to help traffic flow. With four lanes in place between Junction 25 to 28 the new fast lane should be used for faster travelling, i feel the speed limit should be up to 100mph in this area

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
